problem:
v3 = "V - v1"; v4 = "v2 - V"; v5 = "v1 + v2 - V";
In the circuit shown there are four unknown elements and an independent voltage source.
The strength of the source \(V\) is given. Also, there are two known branch voltages: we know \(v_1\) and \(v_2\).
In terms of the known voltages, write an algebraic expression for the branch voltage \(v_3\). Be careful, algebraic expressions are case sensitive.
Write an algebraic expression for the branch voltage \(v_4\):
Write an algebraic expression for the branch voltage \(v_5\):
